attributes.review: Yes can I speak to the manager of this app that has been made. My child downloaded this app a week ago and she got death threats from this orange man that if she didn’t vote she would be beheaded. I am very upset with their tactics and now my child has ptsd. My husband was so upset with it that he had a heart attack!!!! Now I have to bury my husband and my child has ptsd!!!!! This app is so cruel and it should not be on the App Store. -Kathy

attributes.title: I’m dead.

attributes.review: No❤️ this app is not good, I had to go ✨therapy✨ from the trauma this app caused me, as soon I opened the app I saw a terrible image of a man,🐷🍊 and i’ve had nightmares for the past week, he was so, so, so ORANGE *ghasp* I love eating Cheetos and he looks like a Cheeto so I’ve been rethinking life and it’s hard man, the trauma is too much I can’t anymore.
